# **Hello there, Welcome!**

I am an Ocean--Climate Scientist + a Geospatial & Spatiotemporal Data Scientist specialized in developing datasets, analyzing large-scale ocean-atmosphere interactions, and building statistical and machine learning models on large spatiotemporal geophysical datasets.

Extensively experienced in using numerical climate models, reanalysis, and remote sensing products to quantify the impacts of extreme weather and climate variability on physical and human systems.\

### **Recent Highlights**

-   Check out our latest [**Machine Learning Review Paper**](https://doi.org/10.1007/s44295-025-00076-1)**.**

-   Check out our [**newly published article**](https://doi.org/10.1126/sciadv.adw3661) in ***Science Advances** on* low-frequency sea-level modes.
